questions.question: You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

answers.answer: Yesterday, I attended at the launch of the new perfume of the Delavigne corporation, the famous Californian's firm.
Everybody received a sample of it. More than hundred people attended the event and the flagrances that diffused hundred bottles of the perfume was wonderful.
The Parisian's perfumers can have a big problem with this American' competition.
France is no more the best in this matter.
This new perfume is called "blue moon", and it's certainly will become a great succes, not only because it's splendid flagrance but shurely with the skilled marketing of the Americans.
